General.Name: Inspecs Group plc
General.Description: INSPECS Group plc designs, produces, sells, markets, and distributes fashion eyewear, lenses, and OEM products worldwide. It distributes frames and optical products. The company offers its eyewear under the Viktor & Rolf, Valerie, Lyle & Scott, Barbour, Liberty, Henri Lloyd, O'Neill, Caterpillar, BOTANIQ, and other brand names. The company sells its products through various retail outlets directly to retailers, distributors, and brand owners. INSPECS Group plc was founded in 1988 and is based in Bath, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 7-10 Kelso Place, Bath, United Kingdom, BA1 3AU
